entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Random "Access violation writing location" error while calling ToFrozenDictionary after updating from .NET 8 to .NET 9 #110981
  • Does Native AOT support exporting apis by serial number? #110979
  • Calling certain native functions from custom hosted dotnet causes error #110975

Closed

  • public static readonly field not generated until accessed with no explicit static constructor #110978

PullRequests

Created

  • Use correct product version in SPC in servicing #110980
    area-System.Runtime
  • [Test] Add logging and fail-fast option when a thread is reinitialized after cleanup #110977
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Threading, Future

Merged

  • Remove redundant 'unsafe' context #110953
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Fix `ConvertTypeCheckPatternToNullCheck` #110973
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Code modernization in System.Linq #110910
    area-System.Linq
  • Fix GetModuleFileName in GetProcessPath #110888
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Optimize struct parameter register accesses in the backend #110819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

  • xunit template #45645

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #59651
  • One or more errors occurred. (Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Core, Version=9.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=adb9793829ddae60' or one of its dependencies.) #59650

Closed

  • Perf improvement: updates #59649
  • Perf regression: updates #59645

PullRequests

Created

  • Dispose CTS when the Stream is claimed or timeout occurs #59652
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Updated

  • Apply HeadersLengthLimit to preamble in MultipartReader #59646
    feature-http-abstractions, area-networking
  • Add AuthN/AuthZ metrics #59557
    pending-ci-rerun, area-security
  • Use the live crossgen2 corresponding to the runtime we're building against #59551
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-28
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Android] Numeric Editor's cursor is not visible when tapping it inside a ListView #22745
  • [iOS] MenuItem Command not executed with FlyoutHeader set #19149
  • [Windows] System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException when using the GroupShortNameBinding property in Grouped ListView #26534
    Backlog

Updated

  • Android: Pinch gesture not working properly in Carousel #18569
    Backlog
  • Border label text cut off #26619
    Backlog
  • [Android] Entire words omitted & letters truncated from Label display #17884
    Backlog
  • [MAUI][dotnet8][Windows] - A blink occurs when opening a new window #26849
  • [BUG] ios LineBreakMode and MaxLines on Label controls does not work well #23159
    Backlog
  • Entry and Editor: option to disable borders and underline (focus) #7906
    Backlog
  • AddHostObjectToScript does not work in MAUI app (at least for WINDOWS). #26848
  • Allow generic and nested types in x:DataType and x:Type #26835
  • [Android] EdgeToEdge does not work for Modal page #24903
    .NET 9 Servicing

PullRequests

Merged

  • [Windows] Fix for Exception occurring when using the GroupShortNameBinding in a Grouped ListView #26613
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3

Updated

  • Change iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation mechanism #26629
    area-layout, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Windows] Tap Events Incorrectly passed Through Button - fix #26834
    p/0, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Label with a fixed WidthRequest has wrong height in Grid #26648
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label, layout-grid
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 64 #26823
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android & iOS] PopToRootAsync for modal pages - improvements #26851
    community ✨, area-controls-modal

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-28
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

Updated

  • Exception thrown with split tables: System.InvalidOperationException: 'Sequence contains more than one element' #35293
  • Optimize SQL expression comparison by caching hash codes #34149
    Backlog
  • Support for temporal tables for TPT (Table per Type) and other entity-splitting scenarios #26457
    Backlog
  • Generating a sql query #35387

PullRequests

Created

  • Support accessing members of a conditional value #35390

Updated

  • Feature/translate json functions #29306 #30010
  • Avoid duplicating complex expression in comparisons #34172
  • Add EF.Functions.JsonExists(expression, path) DbFunction #35389
